name: MAZED (TmtoSouper)
description: The first game by me, TmtoSouper. You don't need to pay for this, obviously. MAZED is a game set in a maze. You, a green guy, must escape from said maze. Along the way, you'll find lasers, enemies, locked doors, and bugs! Made in 9 or so hours. Try to have fun. Leave whatever comments you want, but please make it constructive criticism!
